Patrick D. Pagnano Empire Roller Skating Collection
Pagnano , Patrick D., 1947-2018
BCMS.0075
25 items , digital photographic images in tiff format.
1980 25 black-and-white digital photographs representing the Empire Roller Skating Rink.
Scope and Contents
This collection consists of 25 black-and-white digital prints scanned from 35 mm film representing the Empire Roller Skating Rink.
Biographical
Italian-American photographer Patrick D. Pagnano was born in in 1947 in Chicago, IL. He attended Columbia College Chicago before moving New York City with his wife Kari. He was hired as a photojournalist, but spent his free time persuing his own photography work. His book Shot on the Street was published in 2002. His work has been widely exhibited.
Conditions Governing Access
Open to researchers without restriction.
